SEARCH
Package food

Class Meal

java.lang.Object
food.Meal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullMeal, HalfMeal
public abstract class Meal extends Object implements Observable
Abstract class representing a meal in the system. A meal is composed of a set of dishes. It maintains attributes such as gluten-free and vegetarian status, delivery frequency, and pricing strategy.
Author:
Alisson Bonatto

  • Constructor Details

    • Meal

      public Meal(String name, Set<Dish> dishes)
      Constructs a Meal with the given name, dishes, gluten-free and vegetarian flags. Uses a default GeneralDiscountMeal pricing strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the meal
      dishes - the set of dishes composing the meal

    • Meal

      public Meal(String name, Set<Dish> dishes, PricingMealStrategy pricingStrategy)
      Constructs a Meal with the given name, dishes, gluten-free and vegetarian flags, and a custom pricing strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the meal
      dishes - the set of dishes composing the meal
      pricingStrategy - the pricing strategy to apply
